meanings.definition: To strike with the open hand, especially on the buttocks as a punishment.
meanings.sent1: Dad spanks me when I misbehave.
meanings.sent2: She spanks the dough to make it flat.
meanings.sent3: The naughty puppy spanks the floor with its tail.
meanings.sent4: The wind spanks the leaves off the trees.
meanings.sent5: The chef spanks the steak to tenderize it.

meanings.definition: A series of spanks as a form of punishment or erotic stimulation.
meanings.sent1: The child received spanks for being naughty.
meanings.sent2: The rhythmic spanks echoed in the room.
meanings.sent3: The spanking machine malfunctioned and gave too many spanks.
meanings.sent4: The spanks in the story added an unexpected twist.
meanings.sent5: The loud spanks startled the audience.
